questions.questionText: What is the primary purpose of software testing?
options: To ensure the software works as expected

questions.questionText: What is Regression Testing?
options: Testing only the modified parts of the code
questions.correctAnswer: Testing only the modified parts of the code

questions.questionText: What does the 'V' in V-Model represent in Software Testing?
Which testing technique is used to verify the behavior of a system against its specifications by feeding it input and examining the output?
Which of the following is not a black-box testing technique?

courses.courseName: React JS- Complete Guide for Frontend Web Development

questions.questionText: What is React?
options: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces

questions.questionText: In React, what is the purpose of the useState hook?
options: To fetch data from an API
To add state to functional components
questions.correctAnswer: To add state to functional components

questions.questionText: What does Redux help manage in a React application?
What is the purpose of React Router?
options: Managing navigation and routing in React applications
Managing API calls in React applications
questions.correctAnswer: Managing navigation and routing in React applications

questions.questionText: What does JSX stand for in React?

courses.courseName: Web Development | HTML | CSS | JavaScript | jQuery | NodeJS

questions.questionText: What does CSS stand for in web development?
Which of the following is NOT a programming language used for web development?
What does API stand for in the context of web development?
Which tag is used to define an unordered list in HTML?
What does AJAX stand for in web development?

courses.courseName: Database Management System from scratch - Part 1

questions.questionText: What does SQL stand for?
Which of the following is a valid data type in SQL to store a date?
What is the purpose of the SQL SELECT statement?
options: To insert data into a table
To delete data from a table
To retrieve data from a table
questions.correctAnswer: To retrieve data from a table

questions.questionText: Which SQL clause is used to filter records based on a specified condition?
What is the primary key in a database table?
options: A unique identifier for a record in a table
A foreign key from another table
questions.correctAnswer: A unique identifier for a record in a table

courses.courseName: The Ultimate Microsoft Excel Mastery Bundle - 8 Courses

questions.questionText: What is the keyboard shortcut to paste values only in Excel (removing formulas)?
What function in Excel is used to find the highest number in a range?
Which Excel feature allows you to view and edit multiple areas of a worksheet in the same workbook?
What is the purpose of the VLOOKUP function in Excel?
options: It finds the highest value in a range
It searches for a value in the leftmost column of a table and returns a value in the same row from a specified column.
It performs vertical addition of a range of cells.
questions.correctAnswer: It searches for a value in the leftmost column of a table and returns a value in the same row from a specified column.9

questions.questionText: What Excel feature is used for data validation, ensuring that users enter only specified values into a cell?

courses.courseName: Learn DevOps: Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform and Azure

questions.questionText: What does DevOps aim to achieve?
options: Combine software development and IT operations.
questions.correctAnswer: Combine software development and IT operations.

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of Continuous Integration (CI) in DevOps?
Which tool is commonly used for containerization in DevOps?
What does the term nfrastructure as Code (IaC) mean in DevOps?
options: Managing infrastructure through code and automation
Using physical hardware for server deployment
questions.correctAnswer: Managing infrastructure through code and automation

questions.questionText: What does Continuous Deployment (CD) involve in DevOps?
options: Manual deployment after every code change
Automated deployment to production after passing tests
questions.correctAnswer: Automated deployment to production after passing tests
